sentence: A few weeks ago, Republican congressional candidate Josh Mandel listed his love of Bitcoin beside his commitment to the “Almighty God” and his family, while outlining the issues he represents.
author: Caleb Ecarma
title: Eric Adams Pulls Crypto-Paycheck Stunt Hours Before Bitcoin Crash

sentence: One of Josh Mandel's final edicts as state treasurer was to allow Ohio businesses to pay their taxes with bitcoin.
author: Haley BeMiller
title: God, family and bitcoin? How cryptocurrency found its way to Ohio's U.S. Senate race

sentence: It cited a recent Tweet from potential Republican Senate nominee for Ohio Josh Mandel, who remains a staunch Trump supporter and recently said that his vision for the future of Ohio is one of a “pro-family, pro-God, pro-Bitcoin” place to live.
author: Maggie Novak
title: Is Cryptocurrency Political?
